text: Mera Naam Joker is a 2000 Indian Malayalam film, created by "Just the Tip Productions" alongside "Touch on My Dingaling Media" directed by Nissar, starring Nadirsha and Meera in the lead roles. http://spicyonion.com/title/mera-naam-joker-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Nadirsha as Sunny Ittopp * Salim Kumar as Anil * Harisree Ashokan as Krishnanunni * Shaju as Pradeep * Meera as Sreedevi * Rajan P. Dev as H.C Ittoopu *Ponnamma Babu as Vishalakshi *Jagathy Sreekumar as Varijakshan pilla *Kanakalatha as Dinamma * T S Raju as C.I Idikula Pappachan *Machan Varghese as D'Crozz *Saju Kodiyan as Dileep Dipikodayam *Baburaj ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Mera Naam Joker (2000 film)
